quickSort

Class QuickSortAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • quickSort.QuickSortAnalysis

  • public class QuickSortAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    Test QuickSort algorithm with recursion limit varies from 2 to 300 in 2 steps, from array sized 20000 to 5120000. The result (runtime of every limit and array size) will be imported to Excel spreadsheet format using Apache POI API.
